objects.specification: A square-shaped floor for a fair booth sized approximately 5 meters by 5 meters, featuring a neutral light wood tone surface with subtle grain texture to mimic real wood planks. The edges are slightly beveled for a refined look and it has a gentle matte finish.

A 3-meter high rectangular wall with an off-white plaster-like texture and subtle surface variation. The finish is matte with clean sharp edges, designed to meet flush at the corners and provide a neutral backdrop.

A 3-meter high rectangular wall with an off-white plaster-like texture and subtle surface variation. The finish is matte with clean sharp edges, designed to meet flush at the corners and provide a neutral backdrop.

A large rectangular entrance opening without a door, spanning approximately 3 meters wide and 2.8 meters tall. It is framed by the same off-white textured wall material with smooth beveled edges and provides unobstructed access.

A modern curved registration desk with a semi-cylindrical front face that sweeps gently back to two flat end panels. It measures about 2 meters wide, 1 meter tall and 0.6 meters deep. The surface has a glossy bright blue finish (RGB 0, 120, 215), featuring smooth rounded edges and a recessed tabletop lip for a refined look.

A minimalist rectangular podium display stand approximately 0.7 meters wide, 1 meter tall, and 0.5 meters deep. It features a clean white matte finish with subtle red accents along the top edge, sharp corners, and a stable weighted base suitable for product presentations.

A round table with a 1 meter diameter top and a central pedestal base. The tabletop is dark gray with a matte finish and a slightly beveled edge, and the base features subtle sculpted detailing for stability and style.

A modern chair with an ergonomic curved backrest and seat, finished in light gray matte. It has four slender legs, a gently contoured seat, and an overall height of 0.9 meters, designed for comfort and a clean aesthetic.

A vertical rectangular fabric banner, 0.5 meters wide and 2 meters tall, rendered in vibrant yellow. It is made from lightweight translucent textile with subtle woven texture. The top features a discreet rod pocket for hanging and the bottom has a hidden weight to ensure a straight drape.

A hanging pendant light with a cylindrical shade 0.2 meters in diameter and 0.4 meters tall, finished in solid yellow. It has a matte exterior, an open bottom for direct downward illumination, and contains a built-in warm light diffuser.

A decorative cluster of 8 glossy latex balloons, each approximately 0.2 meters in diameter, gathered into a compact arrangement. The balloons are vibrant purple and tied together invisibly at the base.
